column5: I need an abu garcia spinning reel repaired. I used a shop that was in Sudbury or North Bay a few years ago, but I forget their name and number. Any help? I think Lew recommended them to me first, they were reasonably priced, and turnaround time on the repair was great.  Thanks!
Hey Pooch,Im dont know the one yer talking about,but Rockys in Orrilla is good for that kind of thing aswell.He is well known.  705-325-3526
I sent Rockys my 23 year old ABU Mag II last week. They called this morning to say it's done already.  10 Brammer Drive, Orillia Ont L3V 7T4
Where are you located Pooch?  A lot of guys have recommended Aikman's in Mississauga, I've taken a couple of reels to them for servicing and was happy with the results.  Mike
That was quick.  Yep Rocky's is the place I used prior. (Not sure why I thought it was in North Bay, duh)  Aikens I've used before, good service there too.  Thanks guys!

If you're out in the Finch & Warden area, here's a guy I've heard very highly recommended by several fishin' aquaintences . . . .  P & F ROD & REEL REPAIR  100 Bridletown Circle, Unit #57  Scarborough, Ontario.  416 â€“ 493 - 6576
I've used Aikmans in Mississauga and have had super service from them. Always repaired properly and fast return.  Mike
